item.title: 显示HN：VSCAN-检测恶意VSCODE扩展
item.description:
您是否知道Vscode扩展程序在包括文件系统，网络和凭据的完整访问中运行？更糟糕的是，数十个恶意扩展已经进入了市场，静静地妥协了设备。 To help tackle this, I built a 100% free tool (no login required) that scans VSCode (and Cursor/Windsurf) extensions for:- Hidden malware and obfuscated code- Dangerous permissions and API misuse- Vulnerable dependencies and suspicious network connectionsUsers have already found hundreds of vulnerabilities in extensions. VSCAN生成了一份干净，开发人员友好的安全报告，以帮助您了解安装的内容。尝试一下： https：///wwwww.vscan.dev 在运行式架构上，还可以在运行式的架子上进行定制的式架构，以拆除式零件的限制。 There is no existing technology that does this, so if you would be interested in trying it out or learning more, please reach out!I would greatly appreciate any feedback and thanks for your help!_______________________________________________________________________________Here are some numbers as to what I have detected from a sample of 1077 extensions that are available on the Marketplace:- 3 extensions are marked as malicious by病毒 - 7个扩展名使用恶意网络连接（通过Virustotal验证） -33个扩展具有关键漏洞的依赖关系 -39个扩展程序具有敏感信息（我已经看到API键，用户名，密码等） -204扩展的发展实践不佳，如OSSF的标志 -71个扩展程序具有很高的权限（虽然不错可以指示潜在的恶意活动）作为一个例子，是与恶意网络终点的扩展分析的链接： https：//vscan.dev/？Analysis ID = 9E6C1849-3973-402B-A4FF-3B4023 ...
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444371740 点：29 ＃评论：21
